name: Pyreworks
description:
Come celebrate with Habanero the dragon as he lights up the sky with magnificent fireworks! Ignite rockets by poking the dragon to launch fireballs and then watch all the explosions in the sky! Habanero likes to put on a show but he’s also lazy and will only shoot 5 fireballs before going back to sleep. Make the most of each fireball to put on the most wondrous celebration the kingdom has ever seen!

How many fireworks can you hit?

FEATURES:

- Simple one touch controls.
- Launch 5 fireballs to explode as many fireworks as you can! Good timing is crucial to your success.
- Use 4 different abilities to make your chains even bigger!
- Feed Habanero the hot pepper to shoot even more fireballs!
- 19 challenging achievements to complete.
- Put on the best fireworks display to make it to the top of the leaderboards.

Note: Offline play is available. No Internet connection is required.
